article_title: Tax Happy Vermont Becoming A State Where Only The Rich Can Afford To Live

article_metadata.description: The Vermont House of Representatives recently approved $48 million in higher taxes and fees. Levies were raised on home heating oil, mutual funds, banks, drivers, and the Employer Health Assessment Tax on businesses who don't provide health insurance for employees was hiked.
article_metadata.author: Patrick Gleason
